caption.p: Protein dysregulation characteristics of IAV-infected A549 cells. ( A) Volcano plots of dysregulated proteins. The dashed horizontal line corresponds to p-value 0.05. Proteins significantly upregulated ≥1.5-fold (≥+0.585 Log 2) are indicated with larger red circles and proteins downregulated ≥1.5-fold (≤−0.585 Log 2) are indicated with larger green circles. ( B) Pairwise R 2 comparisons of indicated virus-infected cellular proteins, with ( C) Individual proteins of selected pairs graphically presented.
